author: he852100
body:
1. Skip password verification
Expected
```powershell
[root@vultr ~]# sudo mount -t cifs -o username=administrator //172.28.202.128/downloads /smb
Password for administrator@//172.28.202.128/downloads:
```
Results
```powershell
[[200173]]: PS /root> sudo mount -t cifs -o username=administrator //172.28.202.128/downloads /smb
Failed to query password: Timer expired
Password for administrator@//172.28.202.128/downloads: mount error(13): Permission denied
Refer to the mount.cifs(8) manual page (e.g. man mount.cifs)
```
2. Cannot enter characters
Expected
```powershell
PS /> enter-pssession          
The authenticity of host '[20]:1234 ([23]:1234)' can't be established.
ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:PisWm3doNMRH6tbUQm//sJZAWcoRFys/oDz1/sVeuL8.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no/[fingerprint])? yes
Warning: Permanently added '[20473]:1234' (ECDSA) to the list of known hosts.
[[2001]]: PS /root>
```

Results
```powershell
PS /> enter-pssession
 The authenticity of host '[2001:3]:1234 ([20]:1234)' can't be established.
ECDSA key fingerprint is SHA256:PisWm3doNMRH6tbUQm//sJZAWcoRFys/oDz1/sVeuL8.
Are you sure you want to continue connecting (yes/no/[fingerprint])?
Please type 'yes', 'no' or the fingerprint:
Please type 'yes', 'no' or the fingerprint:
Enter-PSSession :
```

----
```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.3
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.3
OS                             Linux 4.18.0-80.11.2.el8_0.x86_…
Platform                       Unix
```
title: [My bug report]Cannot be entered when confirming or verifying
